title: Amirty University
description: A responsive website showcasing Amirty University's courses, facilities, and contact information.

title: S3CUREPASS
description: Your sleek password manager. Effortlessly store and access your passwords. Say goodbye to password chaos!

title: IMDb Next App
description: A sleek movie database web app built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Explore, stay updated, and engage with fellow movie lovers. Powered by TMDB API for rich movie data. Responsive design for seamless browsing.

title: To-Do List
description: Effortlessly manage your tasks with this intuitive To-Do List application, designed for simplicity and productivity.

title: Student Registration Form
description: A sleek and intuitive web form for student registration, featuring robust validation and file upload restrictions.

title: Infinitious
description: Endless inspiration with infinite scrolling. Explore captivating images seamlessly on any device. Click, explore, and get lost in a visual journey.

title: Liv Weather App
description: Stay informed about weather conditions and local time with this dynamic application. Enjoy real-time updates and sleek weather icons for any city. Stay stylish, stay informed!

title: ImagiNet
description: Embark on a visual journey like no other with ImagiNet. Explore a treasure trove of mesmerizing images, each one a masterpiece waiting to inspire. From breathtaking landscapes to awe-inspiring portraits, discover the magic of imagery.

title: SpotifyMirror
description: A web application mimicking Spotify's interface, allowing users to browse and play music seamlessly.

title: Calculator
description: A sleek and user-friendly calculator for quick arithmetic calculations. Enjoy responsive design and convenient keyboard input.

title: Quote Cycle
description: Your Daily Dose of Inspiration. Discover, share, and be inspired by random quotes with just a click. Simple, elegant, and motivational.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include interactive gameplay, win and draw detection, and responsive design.
